alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 8:19PM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina...North Carolina... Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Florence and Marion Counties. Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM EST Saturday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Sunday afternoon.
